newsitem.title: UK: BOE forecasts one bln stg shortage, offers help.
newsitem.headline: BOE forecasts one bln stg shortage, offers help.

text.p: The Bank of England offered the UK money market an early round of assistance after forecasting a liquidity shortage of around one billion stg.
The Bank invited money market operators to offer band 1 and 2 bills and offered an unrestricted bill/FRG repo to March 3.
